## The mpg data frame

```{r mpg}
mpg
```

## Creating a ggplot

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
```
